name: Zoe the Exhibitionist
description:
Story


Zoe has locked herself out of her house...naked. Your job is to help her make the right choices that'll lead her to clothes without being seen by too many people...that's chapter 1, anyway. Zoe also gets humiliated in a public gym and needs to take revenge against her new rival as well as survive the first day of her new job without embarrassing herself. Meanwhile, Itsuki is having trouble with naked anxiety dreams and trying to get people to take her seriously while Sarah just wants to have fun.

Features


- Voice Acting for all characters except male player characters
- 5 Chapters and 2 Mini Chapters
- 'A Night with Itsuki' included with this game (Chapter 4)
- Music and sound effects throughout
- Over 1,700 3D Rendered Images


A Night with Itsuki

Itsuki wants to chat. You'll need to type out suggested responses and say the right things to help her finish her project and fall in love with you while also playing strip games and daring each other to do things.

- 342 of the 1,700 3D Rendered Images
- Voice Acting
- Music and sound effects throughout
